comment.author: 33106947@N06
comment._content: According to this site, Chief Meyers' actual name was John Tortes Meyers. His nickname came from the fact that he was a Native American. He was in the Cahuilla tribe, and his mother was a big part of his life. He even altered his diploma from high school, because he didn't finish. He took classes at Dartmouth with the help of a tutor, but was caught for having a false diploma. Shortly after that, his baseball career began as a catcher. bioproj.sabr.org/bioproj.cfm?a=v&v=l&pid=9594&...
